                                boolean randomNumbers,

                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Serializes data for requests to create a game
        Parameters:
        randomTiles - Whether to create a game with random tiles
        randomNumbers - Whether to create a game with random chit placement
        randomPorts - Whether to create a game with random ports

        Serialized data

        Returns:
        Serialized data
